title: Design Agency Platform
description: Developed a modern and fully responsive WordPress website for a design agency, featuring an engaging layout, smooth navigation, and optimized performance to showcase services effectively.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: Worked on the Shopify store 'MirhaPret,' customizing the design, optimizing product listings, and enhancing the overall shopping experience for a seamless and attractive online presence.

title: Gym Showcase Website
description: Developed 'FlexForce,' a dynamic gym showcase website in Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring a modern design, fast performance, and an engaging layout to highlight services, trainers, and fitness programs.

title: UI/UX Design System
description: Designed an intuitive and visually appealing UI/UX for a blood donation app, focusing on ease of navigation, donor-recipient connection, and a seamless user experience to encourage quick and efficient blood donations.
